text: (mesē tibiyadī ovun nirayē adhipatiṭa) “ō mālik! obagē deviyan apagē kāraṇāva avasan kara damatvā! (maraṇaya magin hō apaṭa nidahasa læbunāden!)” yayi śabda nagannāha. eyaṭa ohu “(nohæka), niyata vaśayenma oba (mē tatvayaṭama dan̆ḍuvama vin̆diminma nomærī) sthīrava siṭiya yutuya” yayi pavasanu æta
